name: NDC
description: NDC is the official token of Nigella Diamond Club, playing a pivotal role within the Nigella Chain ecosystem. It powers blockchain-based education, certification programs, and rewards, creating opportunities for participants to earn while they learn and contribute to the growing blockchain community. Nigella Diamond is the education and certification program of the Nigella Chain ecosystem. This program offers participants the opportunity to gain in-depth knowledge about blockchain, NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens), cryptocurrencies, and related technologies. Nigella Diamond provides a comprehensive educational journey catering to both beginners and experienced professionals.
